name: No Way!
description: In this game you have to follow the instructions of a robot to climb to the top of a mountain and reveal what the demon looks like! This game was made for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0 and the theme was: Collaborate with AI and you do that in the game, because the robot (AI) gives you instructions on wich way you have to go. This was my first game and i hope you like it!
